name: Absorb
desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Accelerock
desc: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

name: Acid Armor
desc: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

name: Acid Spray
desc: The user attacks by spitting fluid that works to melt the target. This also harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Acid
desc: Opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.

name: Acrobatics
desc: The user nimbly strikes the target. This attack does massive damage if the user isn't holding an item.

name: Acupressure
desc: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its or its allies' stats.

name: Aerial Ace
desc: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

name: Aeroblast
desc: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: After You
desc: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

name: Agility
desc: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply boosts its Speed stat.

name: Air Cutter
desc: The user launches razor-like wind to slash opposing Pokémon. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Air Slash
desc: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Alluring Voice
desc: The user attacks the target using its angelic voice. This also confuses the target if its stats have been boosted during the turn.

name: Ally Switch
desc: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies. This move's chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Amnesia
desc: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply boosts the user's Sp. Def stat.

name: Ancient Power
desc: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. This may also boost all the user's stats at once.

name: Apple Acid
desc: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created from tart apples. This also lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Aqua Cutter
desc: The user expels pressurized water to cut at the target like a blade. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Aqua Jet
desc: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Aqua Ring
desc: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.

name: Aqua Step
desc: The user toys with the target and attacks it using light and fluid dance steps. This also boosts the user's Speed stat.

name: Aqua Tail
desc: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

name: Arm Thrust
desc: The user attacks the target with open-palmed arm thrusts. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Armor Cannon
desc: The user shoots its own armor out as blazing projectiles. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Aromatic Mist
desc: The user boosts the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

name: Assurance
desc: This move's power is doubled if the target has already taken some damage in the same turn.

name: Astonish
desc: The user attacks the target by crying out in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Astral Barrage
desc: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.

name: Attack Order
desc: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Attract
desc: If the target is of the opposite gender to the user, it becomes infatuated with the user and will sometimes be unable to use its moves.

name: Aura Sphere
desc: The user lets loose a pulse of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.

name: Aura Wheel
desc: Morpeko attacks and boosts its Speed stat with the energy stored in its cheeks. This move's type changes depending on the user's form.

name: Aurora Beam
desc: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

name: Aurora Veil
desc: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only when it is snowing.

name: Avalanche
desc: This move's power is doubled if the target has inflicted damage on the user in the same turn.

name: Axe Kick
desc: The user attacks by kicking up into the air and slamming its heel down upon the target. This may also confuse the target. If it misses, the user takes damage instead.

name: Baby-doll Eyes
desc: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers the target's Attack stat. This move always goes first.

name: Baneful Bunker
desc: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.

name: Barb Barrage
desc: The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict damage. This may also poison the target. This move's power is doubled if the target is already poisoned.

name: Baton Pass
desc: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.

name: Beak Blast
desc: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the user while it's heating up its beak results in a burn.

name: Beat Up
desc: The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target. The more party Pokémon, the greater the number of attacks.

name: Belch
desc: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

name: Belly Drum
desc: The user maximizes its Attack stat but loses HP equal to half its max HP.

name: Bind
desc: A long body, tentacles, or the like are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

name: Bite
desc: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Bitter Blade
desc: The user focuses its bitter feelings toward the world of the living into a slashing attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Bitter Malice
desc: The user attacks the target with spine-chilling resentment. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Blast Burn
desc: The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Blaze Kick
desc: The user launches a kick that has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Bleakwind Storm
desc: The user attacks with savagely cold winds that cause both body and spirit to tremble. This may also lower the Speed stats of opposing Pokémon.

name: Blizzard
desc: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.

name: Block
desc: The user blocks the target's way with arms spread wide to prevent the target from fleeing.

name: Blood Moon
desc: The user unleashes the full brunt of its spirit from a full moon that shines as red as blood. This move can't be used twice in a row.

name: Blue Flare
desc: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Body Press
desc: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user's Defense stat, the greater the damage this move deals.

name: Body Slam
desc: The user attacks by dropping onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Bolt Strike
desc: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Bone Rush
desc: The user attacks by striking the target with a hard bone. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Boomburst
desc: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible explosive sound.

name: Bounce
desc: The user bounces up high on the first turn, then drops onto the target on the next turn. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Branch Poke
desc: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.

name: Brave Bird
desc: The user tucks in its wings and charges at a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Breaking Swipe
desc: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

name: Brick Break
desc: The user attacks with a swift chop. This move can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Brine
desc: This move's power is doubled if the target's HP is at half or less.

name: Brutal Swing
desc: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

name: Bubble Beam
desc: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.

name: Bug Bite
desc: The user attacks by biting the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: Bug Buzz
desc: The user vibrates to generate a damaging sound wave. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Bulk Up
desc: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting its Attack and Defense stats.

name: Bulldoze
desc: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.

name: Bullet Punch
desc: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

name: Bullet Seed
desc: The user attacks by forcefully shooting seeds at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Burning Bulwark
desc: The user's intensely hot fur protects it from attacks and also burns any attacker that makes direct contact with it.

name: Burning Jealousy
desc: The user attacks with energy from jealousy. This leaves all opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted during the turn with a burn.

name: Calm Mind
desc: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to boost its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

name: Ceaseless Edge
desc: The user slashes its shell blade at the target. Shell splinters left behind by this attack remain scattered under the target as spikes.

name: Celebrate
desc: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!

name: Charge Beam
desc: The user attacks the target with an electric charge. The residual electricity may also boost the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Charge
desc: The user becomes charged, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move it uses. This also boosts the user's Sp. Def stat.

name: Charm
desc: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Chilling Water
desc: The user attacks the target by showering it with water that's so cold it saps the target's power. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Chilly Reception
desc: The user tells a chillingly bad joke before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting. This summons a snowstorm lasting five turns.

name: Chloroblast
desc: The user launches its amassed chlorophyll to inflict damage on the target. This also damages the user.

name: Circle Throw
desc: The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Clanging Scales
desc: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack opposing Pokémon. The user's Defense stat is lowered after the attack.

name: Clangorous Soul
desc: The user boosts all its stats by using some of its own HP.

name: Clear Smog
desc: The user attacks the target by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are eliminated.

name: Close Combat
desc: The user fights the target up close, inflicting damage without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Coaching
desc: The user properly coaches its ally Pokémon, boosting their Attack and Defense stats.

name: Coil
desc: The user coils up and concentrates. This boosts its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

name: Collision Course
desc: The user transforms and crashes to the ground, causing a massive prehistoric explosion. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it's a supereffective hit.

name: Comeuppance
desc: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

name: Confide
desc: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Confuse Ray
desc: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that causes confusion.

name: Confusion
desc: The target is hit with a weak telekinetic force to inflict damage. This may also confuse the target.

name: Conversion 2
desc: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the move the target used last.

name: Conversion
desc: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.

name: Copycat
desc: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. This move fails if no other move has been used yet.

name: Cosmic Power
desc: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to boost its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Cotton Guard
desc: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, drastically boosting its Defense stat.

name: Cotton Spore
desc: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to opposing Pokémon. This harshly lowers their Speed stats.

name: Counter
desc: A retaliatory attack that counters any physical move, inflicting double the damage taken.

name: Court Change
desc: With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on either side of the field.

name: Covet
desc: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.

name: Crabhammer
desc: The target is hammered with a large pincer. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Cross Chop
desc: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Cross Poison
desc: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Crunch
desc: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Crush Claw
desc: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Crush Grip
desc: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater the move's power.

name: Curse
desc: A move that has different effects depending on whether the user is a Ghost type or not.

name: Dark Pulse
desc: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with ill intent. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Dark Void
desc: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total darkness that puts them to sleep.

name: Darkest Lariat
desc: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target's stat changes don't affect the damage inflicted by this move.

name: Dazzling Gleam
desc: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

name: Decorate
desc: The user sharply boosts the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats by decorating the target.

name: Defend Order
desc: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, boosting its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Defense Curl
desc: The user curls up and boosts its Defense stat.

name: Defog
desc: A strong wind blows away the target's barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the target's evasiveness.

name: Destiny Bond
desc: If the user is knocked out after using this move, the Pokémon that knocked it out will also faint. This move's chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Detect
desc: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Diamond Storm
desc: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply boost the user's Defense stat.

name: Dig
desc: The user burrows into the ground on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

name: Dire Claw
desc: The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or asleep.

name: Disable
desc: For four turns, the target will be unable to use whichever move it last used.

name: Disarming Voice
desc: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

name: Discharge
desc: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also leave those hit by the attack with paralysis.

name: Dive
desc: The user dives on the first turn, then floats up and attacks on the next turn.

name: Doodle
desc: The user captures the very essence of the target in a sketch. This changes the Abilities of the user and its ally Pokémon to that of the target.

name: Doom Desire
desc: Two turns after this move is used, a concentrated bundle of light blasts the target.

name: Double Hit
desc: The user slams the target with a tail or the like. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Double Kick
desc: The user attacks by kicking the target twice in a row using two feet.

name: Double Shock
desc: The user discharges all the electricity from its body to perform a high-damage attack. After using this move, the user will no longer be Electric type.

name: Double Team
desc: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to boost its evasiveness.

name: Double-edge
desc: A reckless life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Draco Meteor
desc: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Dragon Ascent
desc: The user attacks the target by dropping out of the sky at high speed. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Dragon Breath
desc: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Dragon Cheer
desc: The user raises its allies' morale with a draconic cry so that their future attacks have a heightened chance of landing critical hits. This rouses Dragon types more.

name: Dragon Claw
desc: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws to inflict damage.

name: Dragon Dance
desc: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

name: Dragon Darts
desc: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two opposing Pokémon, this move hits each of them once.

name: Dragon Energy
desc: Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

name: Dragon Hammer
desc: The user wields its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

name: Dragon Pulse
desc: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

name: Dragon Rush
desc: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Dragon Tail
desc: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Drain Punch
desc: The user attacks with an energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Draining Kiss
desc: The user steals the target's HP with a kiss. The user's HP is restored by over half the damage taken by the target.

name: Dream Eater
desc: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Drill Peck
desc: A corkscrewing attack that strikes the target with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

name: Drill Run
desc: The user crashes into the target while rotating its body like a drill. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Drum Beating
desc: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum's roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

name: Dual Wingbeat
desc: The user slams the target with its wings to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Dynamax Cannon
desc: The user condenses energy within its body and unleashes that energy from its core to inflict damage.

name: Dynamic Punch
desc: The user attacks by punching the target with full concentrated power. This also confuses the target.

name: Earth Power
desc: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Earthquake
desc: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

name: Echoed Voice
desc: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used consecutively by any Pokémon, its power is boosted.

name: Eerie Impulse
desc: The user's body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Eerie Spell
desc: The user attacks with its tremendous psychic power. This also drains 3 PP from the move last used by the target.

name: Electric Terrain
desc: The user turns the ground into Electric Terrain for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground can no longer fall asleep.

name: Electro Ball
desc: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move's power.

name: Electro Drift
desc: The user races forward at ultrafast speeds, piercing its target with futuristic electricity. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it's a supereffective hit.

name: Electro Shot
desc: The user gathers electricity on the first turn, boosting its Sp. Atk stat, then fires a high-voltage shot on the next turn. The shot will be fired immediately in rain.

name: Electroweb
desc: The user captures opposing Pokémon in an electric net to inflict damage. This also lowers their Speed stats.

name: Ember
desc: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Encore
desc: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.

name: Endeavor
desc: The user inflicts damage by cutting down the target's HP to roughly equal the user's HP.

name: Endure
desc: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. This move's chance of failing rises if used in succession.

name: Energy Ball
desc: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Entrainment
desc: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.

name: Eruption
desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with explosive fury. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

name: Esper Wing
desc: The user slashes the target with aura-enriched wings. This also boosts the user's Speed stat. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Expanding Force
desc: The user attacks the target with its psychic power. When the ground is Psychic Terrain, this move's power is boosted and it damages all opposing Pokémon.

name: Explosion
desc: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

name: Extrasensory
desc: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Extreme Speed
desc: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Facade
desc: This move's power is doubled if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

name: Fairy Lock
desc: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

name: Fairy Wind
desc: The user attacks by stirring up a fairy wind to strike the target.

name: Fake Out
desc: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It works only on the first turn each time the user enters battle.

name: Fake Tears
desc: The user feigns crying to fluster the target. This harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: False Surrender
desc: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.

name: False Swipe
desc: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

name: Feather Dance
desc: The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

name: Feint
desc: This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.

name: Fell Stinger
desc: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat is boosted drastically.

name: Fickle Beam
desc: The user shoots a beam of light to inflict damage. Sometimes all the user's heads shoot beams in unison, doubling the move's power.

name: Fiery Dance
desc: Cloaked in flames, the user attacks the target by dancing and flapping its wings. This may also boost the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Fiery Wrath
desc: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.

name: Fillet Away
desc: The user sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats by using its own HP.

name: Final Gambit
desc: The user risks everything to attack the target. The user faints but inflicts damage equal to its own HP.

name: Fire Blast
desc: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all- consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Fire Fang
desc: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

name: Fire Lash
desc: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Fire Pledge
desc: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass counterpart, this move's power is boosted and a vast sea of fire appears.

name: Fire Punch
desc: The target is attacked with a fiery punch. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Fire Spin
desc: The user traps the target inside a fierce vortex of fire that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

name: First Impression
desc: Although this move has great power, it works only on the first turn each time the user enters battle.

name: Fissure
desc: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

name: Flail
desc: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.

name: Flame Charge
desc: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks the target. Then, building up momentum, the user boosts its Speed stat.

name: Flame Wheel
desc: The user attacks by cloaking itself in fire and charging at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Flamethrower
desc: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Flare Blitz
desc: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot and may leave the target with a burn.

name: Flash Cannon
desc: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Flatter
desc: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also boosts the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Fleur Cannon
desc: The user unleashes a strong beam. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Fling
desc: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move's power and effects depend on the item.

name: Flip Turn
desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Floral Healing
desc: The user restores the target's HP by up to half its max HP. More HP is restored when the ground is Grassy Terrain.

name: Flower Trick
desc: The user throws a rigged bouquet of flowers at the target. This attack never misses and always lands a critical hit.

name: Fly
desc: The user flies up into the sky on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

name: Flying Press
desc: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

name: Focus Blast
desc: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Focus Energy
desc: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that its future attacks have a heightened chance of landing critical hits.

name: Focus Punch
desc: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. This move fails if the user is hit before using the move.

name: Follow Me
desc: The user draws attention to itself, making all opposing Pokémon take aim only at the user.

name: Force Palm
desc: The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Forest's Curse
desc: The user puts a forest curse on the target. This adds Grass type to the target's type.

name: Foul Play
desc: The user turns the target's strength against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage this move inflicts.

name: Freeze Shock
desc: The turn after using this move, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Freeze-dry
desc: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.

name: Freezing Glare
desc: The user shoots its psychic power from its eyes to attack. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: Frenzy Plant
desc: The user slams the target with the roots of an enormous tree. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Frost Breath
desc: The user attacks by blowing its cold breath on the target. This move always lands a critical hit.

name: Fury Attack
desc: The user attacks by jabbing the target with a horn, a beak, or the like. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Fury Cutter
desc: The user attacks by slashing the target with scythes, claws, or the like. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.

name: Fury Swipes
desc: The user attacks by raking the target with claws, scythes, or the like. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Fusion Bolt
desc: The user throws down a giant lightning bolt. This move's power is boosted when influenced by an enormous flame.

name: Fusion Flare
desc: The user brings down a giant flame. This move's power is boosted when influenced by an enormous lightning bolt.

name: Future Sight
desc: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

name: Gastro Acid
desc: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

name: Giga Drain
desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Giga Impact
desc: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Gigaton Hammer
desc: The user swings its whole body around to attack with its huge hammer. This move can't be used twice in a row.

name: Glacial Lance
desc: The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.

name: Glaciate
desc: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Speed stats.

name: Glaive Rush
desc: The user throws its entire body into a reckless charge. After this move is used, attacks on the user cannot miss and will inflict double damage until the user's next turn.

name: Glare
desc: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

name: Grass Knot
desc: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

name: Grass Pledge
desc: A column of grass hits the target. When used with its water counterpart, this move's power is boosted and a vast swamp appears.

name: Grassy Glide
desc: Gliding on the ground, the user attacks the target. This move always goes first on Grassy Terrain.

name: Grassy Terrain
desc: The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass-type moves.

name: Grav Apple
desc: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Gravity
desc: Enables Flying types or Pokémon with the Levitate Ability to be hit by Ground-type moves for five turns. Moves that involve flying can't be used.

name: Growl
desc: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.

name: Growth
desc: The user's body grows all at once, boosting the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Guard Split
desc: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.

name: Guard Swap
desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.

name: Guillotine
desc: A vicious tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

name: Gunk Shot
desc: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. This may also poison the target.

name: Gust
desc: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

name: Gyro Ball
desc: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user is than the target, the greater the move's power.

name: Hammer Arm
desc: The user swings its strong, heavy fist at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the user's Speed stat.

name: Hard Press
desc: The target is crushed with an arm, a claw, or the like to inflict damage. The more HP the target has left, the greater the move's power.

name: Harden
desc: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to boost its Defense stat.

name: Haze
desc: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

name: Head Smash
desc: The user attacks the target with a hazardous full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly.

name: Headbutt
desc: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Headlong Rush
desc: The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Heal Bell
desc: The user makes a soothing bell chime to cure the status conditions of all its fellow party Pokémon and allies.

name: Heal Pulse
desc: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the target's HP by up to half its max HP.

name: Healing Wish
desc: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status conditions cured.

name: Heart Swap
desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target.

name: Heat Crash
desc: The user slams into the target with its flame-covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.

name: Heat Wave
desc: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on opposing Pokémon. This may also leave them with a burn.

name: Heavy Slam
desc: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.

name: Helping Hand
desc: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally's attack.

name: Hex
desc: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status conditions.

name: High Horsepower
desc: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

name: High Jump Kick
desc: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If this move misses, the user takes damage instead.

name: Hone Claws
desc: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

name: Horn Attack
desc: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

name: Horn Drill
desc: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

name: Horn Leech
desc: The user drains the target's energy with its horns. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Howl
desc: The user howls loudly to rouse itself and its allies. This boosts their Attack stats.

name: Hurricane
desc: The user attacks by wrapping the target in a fierce wind. This may also confuse the target.

name: Hydro Cannon
desc: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Hydro Pump
desc: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

name: Hydro Steam
desc: The user blasts the target with boiling-hot water. This move's power is not lowered in harsh sunlight but rather boosted by 50 percent.

name: Hyper Beam
desc: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Hyper Drill
desc: The user spins the pointed part of its body at high speed to pierce the target. This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

name: Hyper Voice
desc: The user attacks by letting loose a horribly loud, resounding cry.

name: Hyperspace Fury
desc: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect and Detect. This also lowers the user's Defense stat.

name: Hyperspace Hole
desc: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

name: Hypnosis
desc: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall asleep.

name: Ice Beam
desc: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: Ice Burn
desc: The turn after using this move, the user surrounds the target with an ultracold, freezing wind to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Ice Fang
desc: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

name: Ice Hammer
desc: The user swings its strong, heavy fist at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the user's Speed stat.

name: Ice Punch
desc: The target is attacked with an icy punch. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: Ice Shard
desc: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

name: Ice Spinner
desc: The user covers its feet in thin ice and twirls around, slamming into the target. This move's spinning motion also destroys the terrain.

name: Icicle Crash
desc: The user attacks by crashing large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Icicle Spear
desc: The user attacks by launching sharp icicles at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Icy Wind
desc: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers opposing Pokémon's Speed stats.

name: Imprison
desc: If opposing Pokémon know any move also known by the user, they are prevented from using it.

name: Incinerate
desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

name: Infernal Parade
desc: The user attacks with myriad fireballs. This may also leave the target with a burn. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

name: Inferno
desc: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

name: Infestation
desc: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can't flee during this time.

name: Ingrain
desc: The user lays roots that restore its own HP every turn. Because the user is now rooted, it can't switch out.

name: Instruct
desc: The user instructs the target to reuse the move last used by the target.

name: Iron Defense
desc: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

name: Iron Head
desc: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Iron Tail
desc: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Ivy Cudgel
desc: The user strikes with an ivy-wrapped cudgel. This move's type changes depending on the mask worn by the user, and it has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Jaw Lock
desc: This move prevents the user and the target from switching out until either of them faints. The effect goes away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.

name: Jet Punch
desc: The user summons a torrent around its fist and punches at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Judgment
desc: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. This move's type changes depending on the kind of plate held by the user.

name: Jungle Healing
desc: The user becomes one with the jungle, restoring HP and curing status conditions for itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

name: Knock Off
desc: The user slaps down the target's held item, making it unusable for that battle. This move does more damage if the target has a held item.

name: Kowtow Cleave
desc: The user slashes at the target after kowtowing to make the target let down its guard. This attack never misses.

name: Lash Out
desc: The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's stats were lowered during this turn.

name: Last Resort
desc: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

name: Last Respects
desc: The user attacks to avenge its allies. The more defeated allies there are in the user's party, the greater the move's power.

name: Lava Plume
desc: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

name: Leaf Blade
desc: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and cuts the target to inflict damage. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Leaf Storm
desc: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Leafage
desc: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

name: Leech Life
desc: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Leech Seed
desc: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

name: Leer
desc: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers their Defense stats.

name: Lick
desc: The user licks the target with a long tongue to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Life Dew
desc: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

name: Light Screen
desc: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special moves for five turns.

name: Liquidation
desc: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Lock-On
desc: The user takes sure aim at the target. This ensures the user's next move does not miss that target.

name: Low Kick
desc: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

name: Low Sweep
desc: The user makes a swift attack on the target's legs, which lowers the target's Speed stat.

name: Lumina Crash
desc: The user attacks by unleashing a peculiar light that even affects the mind. This also harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Lunar Blessing
desc: The user receives a blessing from the crescent moon, restoring HP and curing status conditions for itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

name: Lunar Dance
desc: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP and PP restored and its status conditions cured.

name: Lunge
desc: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Luster Purge
desc: The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Mach Punch
desc: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Magic Powder
desc: The user scatters a cloud of magic powder that changes the target's type to Psychic.

name: Magic Room
desc: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.

name: Magical Leaf
desc: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.

name: Magma Storm
desc: The user traps the target inside a maelstrom of fire that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

name: Magnet Rise
desc: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

name: Magnetic Flux
desc: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which boosts the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus Ability or the Minus Ability.

name: Make It Rain
desc: The user attacks by throwing out a mass of coins. This also lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat. Money is earned after the battle.

name: Malignant Chain
desc: The user pours toxins into the target by wrapping them in a toxic, corrosive chain. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

name: Matcha Gotcha
desc: The user fires a blast of tea that it mixed. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Mean Look
desc: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

name: Mega Drain
desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Mega Kick
desc: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle- packed power.

name: Mega Punch
desc: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle- packed power.

name: Megahorn
desc: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

name: Memento
desc: The user faints. In return, the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats are harshly lowered.

name: Metal Burst
desc: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

name: Metal Claw
desc: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also boost the user's Attack stat.

name: Metal Sound
desc: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Meteor Beam
desc: The user gathers energy from space and boosts its Sp. Atk stat on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

name: Meteor Mash
desc: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also boost the user's Attack stat.

name: Metronome
desc: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

name: Mighty Cleave
desc: The user wields the light that has accumulated atop its head to cleave the target. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

name: Milk Drink
desc: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP.

name: Mimic
desc: The user copies the move last used by the target. The copied move can be used until the user of Mimic leaves the battle.

name: Minimize
desc: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply boosts its evasiveness.

name: Mirror Coat
desc: A retaliatory attack that counters any special move, inflicting double the damage taken.

name: Mist Ball
desc: A mist-like flurry of down envelops and damages the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Mist
desc: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.

name: Misty Explosion
desc: The user attacks everything around it and faints upon using this move. This move's power is boosted on Misty Terrain.

name: Misty Terrain
desc: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.

name: Moonblast
desc: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Moongeist Beam
desc: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Ability.

name: Moonlight
desc: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

name: Morning Sun
desc: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

name: Mortal Spin
desc: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate the effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also poisons opposing Pokémon.

name: Mountain Gale
desc: The user hurls giant chunks of ice at the target to inflict damage. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Mud Shot
desc: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

name: Mud-slap
desc: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

name: Muddy Water
desc: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.

name: Mystical Fire
desc: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Mystical Power
desc: The user attacks by emitting a mysterious power. This also boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Nasty Plot
desc: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Night Daze
desc: The user looses a pitch-black shock wave at the target to inflict damage. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

name: Night Shade
desc: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

name: Night Slash
desc: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: No Retreat
desc: This move boosts all the user's stats but prevents the user from switching out or fleeing.

name: Noble Roar
desc: Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Nuzzle
desc: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

name: Order Up
desc: The user attacks with elegant poise. If the user has a Tatsugiri in its mouth, this move boosts one of the user's stats based on the Tatsugiri's form.

name: Origin Pulse
desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

name: Outrage
desc: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Overdrive
desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging a guitar or bass guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration.

name: Overheat
desc: The user attacks the target with all its might. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Pain Split
desc: The user adds its HP to the target's HP, then equally splits the combined HP between the target and itself.

name: Parabolic Charge
desc: The user attacks everything around it. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

name: Parting Shot
desc: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Pay Day
desc: Coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

name: Payback
desc: The user stores power, then attacks. This move's power is doubled if the user moves after the target.

name: Peck
desc: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn to inflict damage.

name: Perish Song
desc: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

name: Petal Blizzard
desc: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and damages everything around it.

name: Petal Dance
desc: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Phantom Force
desc: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

name: Photon Geyser
desc: The user attacks the target with a pillar of light. This move inflicts damage using the Attack or Sp. Atk stat- whichever is higher for the user.

name: Pin Missile
desc: The user attacks by shooting sharp spikes at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Play Nice
desc: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Play Rough
desc: The user attacks by playing rough with the target. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

name: Pluck
desc: The user attacks by pecking the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: Poison Fang
desc: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

name: Poison Gas
desc: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the faces of opposing Pokémon, poisoning those it hits.

name: Poison Jab
desc: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, an arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

name: Poison Powder
desc: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.

name: Poison Sting
desc: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

name: Poison Tail
desc: The user hits the target with its tail. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also poison the target.

name: Pollen Puff
desc: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.

name: Poltergeist
desc: The user attacks by controlling the target's item. This move fails if the target isn't holding an item.

name: Population Bomb
desc: The user's fellows gather in droves to perform a combo attack that hits the target one to ten times in a row.

name: Pounce
desc: The user attacks by pouncing on the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

name: Pound
desc: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

name: Powder Snow
desc: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also leave opposing Pokémon frozen.

name: Power Gem
desc: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

name: Power Split
desc: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

name: Power Swap
desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.

name: Power Trick
desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.

name: Power Trip
desc: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user's stats are boosted, the greater the move's power.

name: Power Whip
desc: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the like to lash the target.

name: Precipice Blades
desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

name: Present
desc: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden trap. The gift restores HP sometimes, however.

name: Prismatic Laser
desc: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Protect
desc: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Psybeam
desc: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also confuse the target.

name: Psyblade
desc: The user rends the target with an ethereal blade. This move's power is boosted by 50 percent if the user is on Electric Terrain.

name: Psych Up
desc: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

name: Psychic Fangs
desc: The user attacks by biting the target with its psychic capabilities. This move can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Psychic Noise
desc: The user attacks the target with unpleasant sound waves. For two turns, the target is prevented from recovering HP through moves, Abilities, or held items.

name: Psychic Terrain
desc: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns.

name: Psychic
desc: The target is hit with a strong telekinetic force to inflict damage. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Psycho Boost
desc: The user attacks the target with all its might. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Psycho Cut
desc: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Psyshield Bash
desc: Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target. This also boosts the user's Defense stat.

name: Psyshock
desc: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This move deals physical damage.

name: Psystrike
desc: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This move deals physical damage.

name: Pyro Ball
desc: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Quash
desc: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

name: Quick Attack
desc: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Quick Guard
desc: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.

name: Quiver Dance
desc: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

name: Rage Fist
desc: The user converts its rage into energy to attack. The more times the user has been hit by attacks, the greater the move's power.

name: Rage Powder
desc: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opposing Pokémon aim only at the user.

name: Raging Bull
desc: The user performs a tackle like a raging bull. This move's type depends on the user's form. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Raging Fury
desc: The user rampages around spewing flames for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Rain Dance
desc: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type attacks. The rain also lowers the power of Fire-type attacks.

name: Rapid Spin
desc: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate the effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also boosts the user's Speed stat.

name: Razor Leaf
desc: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at opposing Pokémon. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Razor Shell
desc: The user cuts the target with sharp shells to inflict damage. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Recover
desc: The user regenerates its cells, restoring its own HP by up to half its max HP.

name: Recycle
desc: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

name: Reflect Type
desc: The user reflects the target's type to become the same type as the target.

name: Reflect
desc: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical moves for five turns.

name: Relic Song
desc: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.

name: Rest
desc: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and cures any status conditions.

name: Retaliate
desc: The user takes revenge for a fainted ally. This move's power is boosted if an ally fainted in the previous turn.

name: Revelation Dance
desc: The user attacks the target by dancing with all its might. This move becomes the same type as the user's type.

name: Reversal
desc: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

name: Revival Blessing
desc: The user bestows a loving blessing, reviving a party Pokémon that has fainted and restoring half that Pokémon's max HP.

name: Rising Voltage
desc: The user attacks with electricity rising from the ground. This move's power is doubled if the target is on Electric Terrain.

name: Roar of Time
desc: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Roar
desc: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Rock Blast
desc: The user attacks by hurling hard rocks at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Rock Polish
desc: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This sharply boosts the user's Speed stat.

name: Rock Slide
desc: Large boulders are hurled at opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.

name: Rock Smash
desc: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Rock Throw
desc: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to inflict damage.

name: Rock Tomb
desc: The user hurls boulders at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the target's Speed stat by cutting off its movement.

name: Rock Wrecker
desc: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Role Play
desc: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's Ability.

name: Rollout
desc: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. This attack becomes more powerful each time it hits.

name: Roost
desc: The user lands and rests its body. This move restores the user's HP by up to half its max HP.

name: Round
desc: The user attacks the target with a song. If others use this move, they will act immediately after the initial user, and the power of their Rounds will be boosted.

name: Ruination
desc: The user summons a ruinous disaster. This cuts the target's HP in half.

name: Sacred Fire
desc: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Sacred Sword
desc: The user attacks by slicing with a sword. The target's stat changes don't affect the damage inflicted by this move.

name: Safeguard
desc: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

name: Salt Cure
desc: The user salt cures the target, inflicting damage every turn. Steel and Water types are more strongly affected by this move.

name: Sand Attack
desc: Sand is hurled in the target's face, lowering the target's accuracy.

name: Sand Tomb
desc: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

name: Sandsear Storm
desc: The user attacks by wrapping opposing Pokémon in fierce winds and searingly hot sand. This may also leave them with a burn.

name: Sandstorm
desc: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to damage all Pokémon except Rock, Ground, and Steel types. The sandstorm also boosts the Sp. Def stats of Rock types.

name: Scald
desc: The user attacks by shooting boiling hot water at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Scale Shot
desc: The user attacks by shooting scales two to five times in a row. This move boosts the user's Speed stat but lowers its Defense stat.

name: Scary Face
desc: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.

name: Scorching Sands
desc: The user throws scorching sand at the target to attack. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Scratch
desc: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

name: Screech
desc: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Secret Sword
desc: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn deals physical damage to the target.

name: Seed Bomb
desc: The user attacks by slamming a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

name: Seed Flare
desc: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack the target. This may also harshly lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Seismic Toss
desc: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

name: Self-Destruct
desc: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

name: Shadow Ball
desc: The user attacks by hurling a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Shadow Claw
desc: The user attacks by slashing the target with a sharp claw made from shadows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Shadow Force
desc: The user disappears on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

name: Shadow Punch
desc: The user throws a punch from the shadows. This attack never misses.

name: Shadow Sneak
desc: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

name: Shed Tail
desc: The user creates a substitute for itself using its own HP before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Sheer Cold
desc: The target faints instantly. This move is less likely to hit the target if used by Pokémon other than Ice types.

name: Shell Side Arm
desc: This move is either physical or special-whichever will inflict more damage. This may also poison the target.

name: Shell Smash
desc: The user breaks its shell, which lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

name: Shelter
desc: The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

name: Shift Gear
desc: The user rotates its gears, boosting its Attack stat and sharply boosting its Speed stat.

name: Shock Wave
desc: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack never misses.

name: Shore Up
desc: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP. It regains more HP in a sandstorm.

name: Silk Trap
desc: The user spins a silken trap, protecting itself from damage while lowering the Speed stat of any attacker that makes direct contact.

name: Simple Beam
desc: The user emits a mysterious psychic wave that changes the target's Ability to Simple.

name: Sing
desc: A soothing lullaby is sung in a beautiful voice that puts the target to sleep.

name: Sketch
desc: This move enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the target. Once used, Sketch disappears.

name: Skill Swap
desc: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

name: Skitter Smack
desc: The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Sky Attack
desc: The user attacks the turn after using this move. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also make the target flinch.

name: Slack Off
desc: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half its max HP.

name: Slam
desc: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.

name: Slash
desc: The target is attacked with a slash of claws, scythes, or the like. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Sleep Powder
desc: The user scatters a cloud of soporific dust that puts the target to sleep.

name: Sleep Talk
desc: The user randomly uses one of the moves it knows. This move can only be used while the user is asleep.

name: Sludge Bomb
desc: The user hurls unsanitary sludge at the target to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

name: Sludge Wave
desc: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those it hits.

name: Sludge
desc: The user hurls unsanitary sludge at the target to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

name: Smack Down
desc: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack the target. If the target is in the air, it will be knocked down to the ground.

name: Smart Strike
desc: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

name: Smog
desc: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.

name: Smokescreen
desc: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target's accuracy.

name: Snarl
desc: The user yells as if it's ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stats of opposing Pokémon.

name: Snipe Shot
desc: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's moves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

name: Snore
desc: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

name: Snowscape
desc: The user summons a snowstorm lasting five turns. This boosts the Defense stats of Ice types.

name: Soak
desc: The user shoots a torrent of water that changes the target's type to Water.

name: Soft-Boiled
desc: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP.

name: Solar Beam
desc: The user gathers light on the first turn, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

name: Solar Blade
desc: The user gathers light on the first turn, then fills a blade with the light's energy and attacks on the next turn.

name: Spacial Rend
desc: The user tears the target along with the space around it. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Spark
desc: The user attacks the target with an electrically charged tackle. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Sparkling Aria
desc: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be cured by the touch of these bubbles.

name: Speed Swap
desc: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

name: Spicy Extract
desc: The user emits an incredibly spicy extract, sharply boosting the target's Attack stat and harshly lowering the target's Defense stat.

name: Spikes
desc: The user lays a trap of spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will damage opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: Spiky Shield
desc: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker that makes direct contact.

name: Spin Out
desc: The user spins furiously by straining its legs, inflicting damage on the target. This also harshly lowers the user's Speed stat.

name: Spirit Break
desc: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target's spirit. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Spirit Shackle
desc: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target's shadow to the ground to prevent the target from fleeing.

name: Spit Up
desc: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the move's power.

name: Spite
desc: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

name: Splash
desc: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

name: Spore
desc: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

name: Springtide Storm
desc: The user attacks by wrapping opposing Pokémon in fierce winds brimming with love and hate. This may also lower their Attack stats.

name: Stealth Rock
desc: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap damages opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: Steam Eruption
desc: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Steel Beam
desc: The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its entire body. This also damages the user.

name: Steel Roller
desc: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move fails if the ground hasn't turned into a terrain.

name: Steel Wing
desc: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also boost the user's Defense stat.

name: Sticky Web
desc: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stats upon switching into battle.

name: Stockpile
desc: The user stores power and boosts its Defense and Sp. Def stats. This move can be used up to three times.

name: Stomp
desc: The user attacks by stomping on the target with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Stomping Tantrum
desc: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's previous move failed.

name: Stone Axe
desc: The user swings its stone axes at the target. Stone splinters left behind by this attack float around the target.

name: Stone Edge
desc: The user stabs the target with sharpened stones. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Stored Power
desc: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user's stats are boosted, the greater the move's power.

name: Strange Steam
desc: The user attacks the target by emitting steam. This may also confuse the target.

name: Strength Sap
desc: The user restores its own HP by the same amount as the target's Attack stat. It then lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Strength
desc: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

name: String Shot
desc: The user blows silk from its mouth that binds opposing Pokémon and harshly lowers their Speed stats.

name: Struggle Bug
desc: The user attacks by struggling against opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Sp. Atk stats.

name: Stuff Cheeks
desc: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply boosts its Defense stat.

name: Stun Spore
desc: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

name: Substitute
desc: The user creates a substitute for itself using some of its own HP. The substitute serves as the user's decoy.

name: Sucker Punch
desc: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

name: Sunny Day
desc: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type attacks. The sunlight also lowers the power of Water-type attacks.

name: Sunsteel Strike
desc: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Ability.

name: Super Fang
desc: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target's HP in half.

name: Supercell Slam
desc: The user electrifies its body and drops onto the target to inflict damage. If this move misses, the user takes damage instead.

name: Superpower
desc: The user attacks the target with great power. This also lowers the user's Attack and Defense stats.

name: Supersonic
desc: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

name: Surf
desc: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

name: Surging Strikes
desc: The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the target with a flowing motion three times in a row. This move always lands a critical hit.

name: Swagger
desc: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply boosts the target's Attack stat.

name: Swallow
desc: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to restore its own HP. The more power is stored, the more HP is restored.

name: Sweet Kiss
desc: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

name: Sweet Scent
desc: The user releases a scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon's evasiveness.

name: Swift
desc: Star-shaped rays are shot at opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

name: Switcheroo
desc: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

name: Swords Dance
desc: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply boosts the user's Attack stat.

name: Synthesis
desc: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

name: Syrup Bomb
desc: The user sets off an explosion of sticky candy syrup, which coats the target and causes the target's Speed stat to drop each turn for three turns.

name: Tachyon Cutter
desc: The user attacks by launching particle blades at the target twice in a row. This attack never misses.

name: Tackle
desc: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

name: Tail Glow
desc: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically boosting its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Tail Slap
desc: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Tail Whip
desc: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Defense stats.

name: Tailwind
desc: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that boosts the Speed stats of itself and its allies for four turns.

name: Take Down
desc: A reckless full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

name: Take Heart
desc: The user lifts its spirits, curing its own status conditions and boosting its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

name: Tar Shot
desc: The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the target's Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to Fire-type moves.

name: Taunt
desc: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

name: Tearful Look
desc: The user gets teary-eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Teatime
desc: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon currently in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

name: Teeter Dance
desc: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses every Pokémon around it.

name: Teleport
desc: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if any. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.

name: Temper Flare
desc: Spurred by desperation, the user attacks the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's previous move failed.

name: Tera Blast
desc: If the user has Terastallized, it unleashes energy of its Tera Type. This move inflicts damage using the Attack or Sp. Atk stat-whichever is higher for the user.Stellar: Inflicts damage with the user's Attack or Sp. Atk stat- whichever is higher. Super effective against Terastallized targets. This lowers the user's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Tera Starstorm
desc: With the power of its crystals, the user bombards and eliminates the target. When used by Terapagos in its Stellar Form, this move damages all opposing Pokémon.

name: Terrain Pulse
desc: The user utilizes the energy of the terrain to attack. This move's type and power change depending on the terrain at the time the move is used.

name: Thief
desc: The user attacks and steals the target's held item simultaneously. The user can't steal anything if it already holds an item.

name: Thrash
desc: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Throat Chop
desc: The user attacks the target's throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns.

name: Thunder Cage
desc: The user traps the target inside a cage of sparking electricity that inflicts damage for four to five turns.
