name: Thunder Fang
desc: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

name: Thunder Punch
desc: The target is attacked with an electrified punch. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunder Shock
desc: The user attacks the target with a jolt of electricity. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunder Wave
desc: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

name: Thunder
desc: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunderbolt
desc: The user attacks the target with a strong electric blast. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunderclap
desc: This move enables the user to attack first with a jolt of electricity. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

name: Thunderous Kick
desc: The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like movement before delivering a kick. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Tickle
desc: The user tickles the target into laughing, lowering its Attack and Defense stats.

name: Tidy Up
desc: The user tidies up and removes the effects of Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, Toxic Spikes, and Substitute. This also boosts the user's Attack and Speed stats.

name: Topsy-Turvy
desc: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

name: Torch Song
desc: The user blows out raging flames as if singing a song, scorching the target. This also boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Torment
desc: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

name: Toxic Spikes
desc: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: Toxic Thread
desc: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target's Speed stat.

name: Toxic
desc: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

name: Trailblaze
desc: The user attacks suddenly as if leaping out from tall grass. The user's nimble footwork boosts its Speed stat.

name: Transform
desc: The user transforms into a copy of the target, right down to having the same move set.

name: Tri Attack
desc: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. This may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

name: Trick Room
desc: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

name: Trick
desc: The user catches the target off guard and swaps the target's held item with its own.

name: Triple Arrows
desc: The user kicks, then fires three arrows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also lower the target's Defense stat or make it flinch.

name: Triple Axel
desc: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

name: Triple Dive
desc: The user performs a perfectly timed triple dive, hitting the target with splashes of water three times in a row.

name: Triple Kick
desc: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

name: Trop Kick
desc: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Twin Beam
desc: The user shoots mystical beams from its eyes to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Twister
desc: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

name: U-turn
desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Upper Hand
desc: The user reacts to the target's movement and strikes with the heel of its palm, making the target flinch. This move fails if the target is not readying a priority move.

name: Uproar
desc: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.

name: Vacuum Wave
desc: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

name: Venoshock
desc: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move's power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

name: Victory Dance
desc: The user performs an intense dance to usher in victory, boosting its Attack, Defense, and Speed stats.

name: Vine Whip
desc: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

name: Vise Grip
desc: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

name: Volt Switch
desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Volt Tackle
desc: The user electrifies itself and charges the target to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot and may leave the target with paralysis.

name: Water Gun
desc: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

name: Water Pledge
desc: A column of water hits the target. When used with its fire counterpart, this move's power is boosted and a rainbow appears.

name: Water Pulse
desc: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

name: Water Shuriken
desc: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

name: Water Spout
desc: The user spouts water to damage opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

name: Waterfall
desc: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

name: Wave Crash
desc: The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Weather Ball
desc: This move's type and power change depending on the weather at the time the move is used.

name: Whirlpool
desc: The user traps the target inside a violent, swirling whirlpool that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

name: Whirlwind
desc: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Wicked Blow
desc: The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the target with a fierce blow. This move always lands a critical hit.

name: Wide Guard
desc: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.

name: Wild Charge
desc: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into the target. This also damages the user a little.

name: Wildbolt Storm
desc: The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely attacks with lightning and wind. This may also leave opposing Pokémon with paralysis.

name: Will-o-wisp
desc: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.

name: Wing Attack
desc: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

name: Wish
desc: One turn after this move is used, the user's or its replacement's HP is restored by up to half the user's max HP.

name: Withdraw
desc: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, boosting its Defense stat.

name: Wonder Room
desc: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

name: Wood Hammer
desc: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Work Up
desc: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are boosted.

name: Worry Seed
desc: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target's Ability Insomnia.

name: Wrap
desc: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

name: X-scissor
desc: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes, claws, or the like as if they were a pair of scissors.

name: Yawn
desc: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

name: Zap Cannon
desc: The user attacks by firing an electric blast like a cannon. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

name: Zen Headbutt
desc: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Zing Zap
desc: The user crashes into the target, delivering a powerful electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.
